name: UpdatePortfolio
description:
Update an existing Asana portfolio.

Use this tool to update an existing Asana portfolio. Only the specified fields in the request data will be updated, and any unspecified fields will remain unchanged. Requires the 'portfolios:write' scope.

parameters.name: portfolio_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio to be updated.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

parameters.name: portfolio_update_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the fields to update in the portfolio. Only specified fields will change.

value_schema.description: The updated fields for the portfolio.

parameters.name: include_optional_fields
parameters.description: A list of optional portfolio properties to include in the response, specified as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.description: Provides formatted and indented output. Use primarily for debugging as it increases response size and processing time.
